settings.heading: Enbrighten's New Permanent Outdoor Google Home Smart Lights Set the Vibe for Eternity with Some Serious Curb Appeal
settings.text: 9to5Toys features Enbrighten’s Eternity Eave Lights in this article, noting the one-and-done installation that delivers year‑round curb appeal with customizable warm, cool and holiday-themed illumination directly from the Enbrighten app.

settings.heading: Last-Minute Father’s Day Tech Gift Deals: Dive Watches, Smart Lights, and More
settings.text: GearBrain highlights Enbrighten's smart lighting solutions as standout Father's Day tech gifts, emphasizing their ability to enhance home ambiance with customizable colors, voice control, and flexible installation options.

settings.heading: Best Smart Lighting 2025: Smart Bulbs, String Lights, Outdoor and More
settings.text: PCWorld spotlights Enbrighten’s outdoor lighting lineup, praising the Wi‑Fi Café Lights for their vibrant colors, durability, and daisy‑chainability, as well as the Eternity Lights for hassle‑free permanent installation and fully customizable year‑round décor.

settings.heading: Best Smart Plugs for 2025: Easy Upgrades for Home Electronics
settings.text: CNET highlights the Enbrighten Smart Plug for bringing extra convenience outdoors, thanks to its dual-outlet design that adds versatility when using smart devices outside.

settings.heading: Jasco Expands Enbrighten Line with Eternity Lights for Year-Round Outdoor Use
settings.text: GearBrain spotlights Enbrighten’s Eternity Eave Lights as a durable, permanently installed outdoor lighting solution offering tunable white-to-RGBWIC colors, robust weatherproofing, and customizable app and voice‑assistant control for year‑round décor.

settings.heading: 32 Dorm Essentials You'll Want to Add to Your Packing List ASAP so You Don't Forget Later On
settings.text: E! News features Enbrighten's LED Color-Changing Neon Rope Light, highlighting it as a dorm essential for creating a personalized and cozy atmosphere with 56 color options, app and voice control compatibility, and a flexible design that's easy to hang or shape.

settings.heading: These Smart String Lights Can Stay Up All Year and Are Cheaper Than the Competition
settings.text: ZDNet highlights Enbrighten's Eternity Lights as durable, year-round outdoor lighting solutions, emphasizing their affordability and ability to withstand various weather conditions. They offer customizable color options and are designed to remain installed throughout the year, providing both functionality and aesthetic appeal for outdoor spaces.

settings.heading: Jasco’s Eternity Lights Can Be Installed Just Once for All Seasons
settings.text: MSN's feature Enbrighten Eternity Lights, highlighting their ability to provide permanent, customizable outdoor lighting that eliminates the hassle of seasonal setup and takedown. They offer a range of colors and effects, are compatible with smart home systems, and are designed to withstand various weather conditions year-round.

settings.heading: The Best Smart Dimmer Switches of 2025
settings.text: PCWorld highlights the Enbrighten Zigbee In-Wall Smart Dimmer for its easy installation, slim design, and reliable performance, making it an excellent choice for seamless integration into Zigbee-based smart home systems.

settings.heading: The 8 Best Outdoor String Lights, Tested and Reviewed
settings.text: The Spruce praises Enbrighten LED Smart Color Changing String Lights for their customizable colors, app-controlled features, and weather-resistant durability, making them a versatile choice for outdoor spaces.

settings.heading: The 7 Best Outdoor Floodlights for Bright and Safe Yards
settings.text: The Spruce names Enbrighten's 3-Head Motion-Activated Flood Light as their top-rated floodlight with a built-in motion sensor. Featuring its 180 wide detection area and powerful illumination.

settings.heading: 10 Best Outdoor Lights for Good Illumination 2024
settings.text: U.S. News features Enbrighten’s Three-Head Motion-Activated Flood Light in this article, highlighting its adjustable detection range, repositionable lights, and customizable brightness, along with weather resistance and dusk-to-dawn functionality for enhanced security and convenience.

settings.heading: 8 Amazon Products Retirees Need To Buy Ahead of Fall
settings.text: MSN highlights Enbrighten Eternity Permanent Outdoor Lights as an easy-to-install solution for seasonal decor, allowing users to change colors effortlessly via the app or voice control with Alexa and Google Home, making holiday transformations simple and convenient with an all-in-one kit.

settings.heading: Best Outdoor String Lights for 2025: Illuminate Your Balcony, Patio, Backyard and More
settings.text: CNET highlights Enbrighten Classic LED Cafe Lights for their durability, premium feel, and bright output, noting their heavy-duty design with inset air bubbles, making them stand out in quality.

settings.heading: These Outdoor Lights Look Built-In, but They’re Actually Renter-Friendly
settings.text: Apartment Therapy features Enbrighten’s Eternity Permanent Outdoor Lights, highlighting their easy DIY installation, weatherproof durability, and smart control via Google Home, noting that the lights can be cut to a custom length, praising their seamless integration with Alexa and WiFi, allowing users to set up zones for different areas of the home.
